data.actual_result: Game info never closes, forcing you to restart Discord to get rid of it.
data.expected_result: Game info closes when you click outside.
data.short_description: Clicking multiple times on the avatar shown on the games under activity tab does not close the game.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the activity tab. - Click on any game title. It should pop up the game info with "recently played" and "now playing" screen. - Click on the profile pic of your friend at least 3 times. - Click somewhere outside of the game info so the game info closes.
